page.title: 16Farming _ Milk production.
page.content: Mr.C is the cowman and dairyman on a large farm specialising in milk production. He is responsible for the well_being of 110 milking cows, 30 young heifers and 2 bulls. Apart from one bull which is a Hereford pedigree all the stock are Friesians. On average each milking cow produces over 24 litres of milk per day. They are milked twice a day at 0630 and 1530h. Each cows diet is supplemented with 'cake', small pieces of specially compounded food stuffs. Mrs.C keeps accurate records of each cows total performance. Some of the cows fetch about Â£1000 when auctioned in the market. Each animal is regularly tested to ensure that it is free of tuberculosis and brucelosis.
